sources.title: Make Mine Freedom (1948)
sources.description: This Cold War-era cartoon uses humor to tout the dangers of Communism and the benefits of capitalism.

sources.title: Make Mine Freedom (1948)
sources.description: This Cold War-era cartoon uses humor to tout the dangers of Communism and the benefits of capitalism. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/make-mine-freedom-1948/

metadata.Plot: A snake oil salesman is trying to seduce the American people into surrendering their freedoms for the world's most dangerous force of nature: ism (Communism). But one man will stand up to the salesman and challenge his pitch before tricking the Americans into giving up their freedom.
metadata.Director: Joseph Barbera, William Hanna, George Gordon
metadata.Actors: Billy Bletcher, John Brown, Stan Freberg
